name: Larie Jane Rubi
title: UI/UX Designer
bio: Passionate UI/UX designer with 5+ years of experience creating intuitive and visually stunning digital experiences. Specialized in user research, wireframing, prototyping, and Figma design.
about: I'm a UI/UX designer who transforms complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs. My approach combines user research, data-driven decision making, and creative problem solving.

projects.title: E-Commerce Mobile App
projects.description: A seamless shopping experience with intuitive navigation and modern UI. Increased conversion rate by 35%.
projects.long_description: Complete redesign of a mobile shopping app focusing on streamlined checkout process and personalized recommendations.

projects.title: Banking Dashboard
projects.description: Clean and professional dashboard for financial management with real-time analytics and intuitive data visualization.
projects.long_description: Designed a comprehensive banking dashboard that simplifies complex financial data through clear visualizations.

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: Motivating users to achieve their fitness goals with gamification and personalized workout plans.
projects.long_description: Created an engaging fitness tracking app combining health monitoring with social motivation.

projects.title: Restaurant Booking Platform
projects.description: Elegant platform for discovering and booking restaurants with advanced search filters.
projects.long_description: Developed a sophisticated restaurant booking platform that makes discovering and reserving tables effortless.

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.text: Outstanding design work that exceeded our expectations. The new app interface has significantly improved our conversion rates.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Working with this designer was a pleasure. Creative solutions to complex problems and beautiful, functional designs.

experience.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
experience.description: Leading design initiatives for multiple product lines and mentoring junior designers.

experience.title: UI/UX Designer
experience.description: Designed digital experiences for various clients across different industries.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.description: Focused on digital design, user experience, and visual communication.
